'''Character Development Items''' are items in ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' used to upgrade [[Character]]s and [[Weapon]]s. It is the third tab in the [[Inventory]].

Items Types in this category include:
* [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material]]s
* [[Character Ascension Material]]s
* [[Character EXP Material]]s
* [[Character Level-Up Material]]s
* [[Refinement Material]]s
* [[Character Talent Material]]s
* [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s
